cleaned_text: Herbal Energy Tea [](/products/herbal-energy-tea) Herbal Energy Tea Our tea aims to optimize your body's energy levels, giving it a natural, caffeine-free performance boost. It features Muicle, an evergreen shrub native to Mexico and Central America, used since pre-Colombian times as a traditional medicine for the treatment of various ailments, such as dysentery, diabetes, leukemia, and anemia, just to name a few. Muicle's phytochemical makeup has been shown to include essential oils, minerals (potassium, calcium, sulfate, etc.), and notable concentrations of beneficial phenols, flavonoids and antioxidants. Bioavailable minerals nourish and oxygenate the blood, while reducing blood sugar levels. Traditionally used as an indigo-blue dye, and to treat emotional disorders ('the blues'), Muicle has a natural antidepressant and motivating effect signified by bright orange trumpet-like flowers. 8 OZ / 227 G [Read More](javascript:void(0)) Share Benefits Benefits - Increase Iron Levels* - Boost & Maintain Stamina* - Cleanse The Blood* Ingredients Ingredients Directions Directions Proprietary Statement Proprietary Statement FDA statement FDA statement
